{"blocks":[{"key":"eolvp","text":"Place the mid-skirt plate containing template and Master Mix in the thermal cycler and run the Multiplex PCR Program.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ebra","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9r5bb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6bc6l","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"97s7n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":95,"offset":103,"style":"bold"}],"key":"6k5um","text":"Near the completion of the thermal cycler run, prepare the Indexing Reaction Mix in the post-PCR area. All components except indexes may be added to the Master Mix when running multiple samples in parallel. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ec89c","text":"Make sure that beads and samples are at room temperature. Spin down the sample plate and briefly vortex beads to homogenize before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"72rkk","text":"Add   of magnetic beads (ratio: 1.0x) to each 30 uL sample after thermal cycling and mix by vortexing. Pulse-spin the samples in a microcentrifuge tube to collect contents.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":92,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6412b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dsaud","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"34vbr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c2hp9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"B2D233802FCF11EEA2CCB97DAF9FD385","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3n3h8","text":"Make sure no bead-sample suspension droplets are left on the sides of the tube. If droplets are visible, pulse-spin the samples in a microcentrifuge to collect contents.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e7q98","text":"Incubate the samples for   minutes at room temperature, off the magnet. After incubation, place the sample tubes on a magnetic rack until the solution clears and a pellet is formed (about   minutes).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":188,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"2BE7E7402FD211EEA2CCB97DAF9FD385","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"5C9BDC202FD211EEA2CCB97DAF9FD385","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"nbo7","text":"While the sample is on the magnet, remove and discard the supernatant without disturbing the pellet (about   may be left behind) using a clean pipette tip. Leave the plate on the magnet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":107,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"449a9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"87EB33802FD211EEA2CCB97DAF9FD385","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4atoi","text":"Add   of freshly prepared 80% ethanol solution to the pellet while it is still on the magnet. Use care not to disturb the pellet. Incubate for   seconds, then carefully remove the ethanol solution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":143,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3a3g2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"180","error":false,"guid":"9C5D6C702FD211EEA2CCB97DAF9FD385","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"C83A5DD02FD211EEA2CCB97DAF9FD385","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fimtq","text":"Repeat the previous step, for a second wash with the ethanol solution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2gt6l","text":"Pulse-spin the samples in a microcentrifuge, place back onto the magnet, and remove any residual ethanol solution from the bottom of the tube with a small volume tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Indexing PCR Master Mix (while the samples are on the thermal cycler)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3nf2","text":"Before mixing reagents, calculate the total volume of master mix based on the number of reactions required, with 15% overage for pipetting. It is recommended to prepare at least 10 reactions at any one time to maintain a volume of Enzyme I3 that can be accurately pipetted.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epdpa","text":"Add   of fresh magnetic beads (ratio: 0.85x) to each 50 uL sample after thermal cycling and mix by vortexing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":99,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fr36v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qpvq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"tt0d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"42.5","error":false,"guid":"58EF8DD12FEE11EE924B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3n3h8","text":"Make sure no bead-sample suspension droplets are left on the sides of the tube. If droplets are visible, pulse-spin the samples in a microcentrifuge to collect contents.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bgfsh","text":"Incubate the samples for   minutes at room temperature, off the magnet. Pulse-spin the samples in a microcentrifuge. Afterwards, place the sample tubes on a magnetic rack until the solution clears and a pellet is formed (about   minutes).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":227,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"62E7B90A2FEE11EE924B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"62E7B9882FEE11EE924B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ccvpg","text":"While the sample is on the magnet, remove and discard the supernatant without disturbing the pellet (about   may be left behind) using a clean pipette tip. Leave the plate on the magnet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":107,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"678D10662FEE11EE924B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1s1th","text":"Add   of freshly prepared 80% ethanol solution to the pellet while it is still on the magnet. Use care not to disturb the pellet. Incubate for   seconds, then carefully remove the ethanol solution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":143,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cp8rp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"180","error":false,"guid":"6D0638712FEE11EE924B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"180","duration":30,"error":false,"guid":"6D0638CB2FEE11EE924B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ehfsu","text":"Repeat the previous step, for a second wash with the ethanol solution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"88rrc","text":"Pulse-spin the samples in a microcentrifuge, place back onto the magnet, and remove any residual ethanol solution from the bottom of the tube with a small volume tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"874nb","text":"Immediately add   of post-PCR TE buffer and resuspend the pellet by pipetting up and down until homogenous. Incubate for   minutes off the magnet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":16,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":121,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"22","error":false,"guid":"373A97602FEF11EEA2CCB97DAF9FD385","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"4A0E62902FEF11EEA2CCB97DAF9FD385","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eiv67","text":"Place the samples back on the magnet and transfer the clean   library eluates to a fresh plate. Make sure that the eluate does not contain magnetic beads (indicated by brown color in eluate). If magnetic beads are present, place the plate on the magnet, wait for pellets to re-form, then transfer eluate again.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"37grr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"61F995A02FEF11EEA2CCB97DAF9FD385","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5t8ff","text":"SAFE STOP: Store freshly prepared libraries at -20oC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11},{"style":"sup","offset":50,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"375c5","text":"Incubate the samples for   minutes at room temperature, off the magnet. After incubation, place the sample tubes on a magnetic rack until the solution clears and a pellet is formed (about   minutes).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":188,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"2BE7E7402FD211EEA2CCB97DAF9FD385","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"5C9BDC202FD211EEA2CCB97DAF9FD385","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9eb1s","text":"While the sample is on the magnet, remove   of the supernatant without disturbing the pellet using clean pipette tips and transfer to a new plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a5pi1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"17.4","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
